title.rendered:
COP29 Unveils Accommodation Platform


USA – English





USA – English

content.rendered:
Portal Will Enable Participants and Attendees to Book Rooms for November Event in Baku

BAKU, Azerbaijan, May 23, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Azerbaijan, the host of COP29, today unveiled its interactive accommodation portal, the system that will enable participants and attendees to book hotel rooms and other lodging for the United Nations Climate Change Conference being held in Baku in November.

In a press conference at the COP29 Office, Azada Huseynova, Deputy Chair of the State Tourism Agency of the Republic of Azerbaijan, said the accommodation system has been designed to ensure that a range of room types and locations will be available to people who want to attend the event.


Continue Reading

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/cop29-unveils-accommodation-platform-302154555.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
